verses.name: Leviticus 23:29
verses.text: For whatsoever soul it be that shall not be afflicted in that same day, he shall be cut off from among his people.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:30
verses.text: And whatsoever soul it be that doeth any work in that same day, the same soul will I destroy from among his people.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:31
verses.text: Ye shall do no manner of work: it shall be a statute for ever throughout your generations in all your dwellings.

verses.name: Leviticus 23:32
verses.text: It shall be unto you a sabbath of rest, and ye shall afflict your souls: in the ninth day of the month at even, from even unto even, shall ye celebrate your sabbath.
